attributes.action: allow beer and cider for example to be sold in pubs and clubs in other measure sizes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Pubs and clubs should be allowed to sell alcohol in any measurement size they wish as long as they indicate what the measure is.

For example certain beers maybe sold in 440ml glasses, others 500ml glasses, some people might only want a 200ml glass or 150ml glass. Some may want a pint, but this will officially be 568ml - people can still ask for a pint and the pub or club can either supply 568ml or say we only sell up to 500ml, the choice up to the pub or club.
